participant_1.background:
I started writing and recording blues music in my spare time.
I am trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
My child is the light of my life and helps me take my mind off of my worries.
i worry about my image.
I am short but my French bulldog is tall.

participant_2.background:
I think my pets are the best things in my life.
I enjoy swimming, hiking, and spending time with my family.
i love to surf.
I've spent way too much money on gummy worms.
I rode my motorcycle across the country.

content.text: Doing good! Just finished a hike with my dog.
Nice! I love hiking. It's a great way to get some exercise and spend time with the dog.
Yeah, it is. I've been trying to do it more often.
I hear that. It can be hard to find the time, but it's worth it.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad I decided to go today.
Me too. What kind of dog do you have?
A French bulldog. He's a big goofball.
French bulldogs are the best! I love their big heads and smooshed faces.
Me too! They're so cute and cuddly.
I'm sure he's a great hiking buddy.
He is! He loves to explore and go on adventures.
Sounds like you have a great dog.
